title: Standard Jhin gets High noon Jhins mark when in game vs High Noon Jhin (blind Pick)
body: What the title says, Im pretty sure it happened every time the  enemy poppy walked on a trap, and did not happen when I auto attacked. Reproducible 9/10 times.

replies.body:
Hey Sniksder16! 

Looks like a case of particle theft! D: Thanks for the report!
